Row.Text: Welcome, great ruler! Though I pay respect at your court, know that I kneel to no king but Allah.
Welcome to the Mali Empire! Have some gold... I've got plenty!
All the gold and all the salt in the world could not buy me victory!
What sin did I commit to deserve this fate? Did I not share my wealth with all who visited my court?
We do not have time for your games...
I didn't realize there were countries as poor as yours...
Ah, my friend! It is always a pleasure to entertain you at my court.
Your war doesn't concern me. If you want to discuss something else, make it quick.
It is a sin what they have done to your lands. How can I help?
I consider the entirety of the desert my domain. Do not be so quick to claim what isn't yours.
I am more than willing to defend my lands. Do not test me.
Do not think I haven't noticed your recent expansion. Let us hope our countries can remain on the path of peace.
The ranks of your jonow are endless! Together, there is much we can achieve.
I see we've both been blessed with rich lands.
I didn't realize there were countries as poor as yours...
Your army would quickly be overwhelmed and made into sumbas.
Only Allah can forgive your transgressions.
I do not yet see you as a brother.
Sins such as yours cannot be forgiven.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
No king but Allah has the right to judge my actions.
Praise Allah for guiding you to {1_CivName}! They are a kind and generous people.
{1_CivName}... a mouth that praises and a hand that kills.
Perhaps you should reconsider {1_CivName}. They have proven themselves wise and righteous.
{1_CivName} cannot to be trusted.
Praise Allah for guiding you to {1_CivName}. They are indeed a worthy ally.
I had already planned to deal with you after {1_CivName}.
{1_CivName} is truly unjust and wretched. Perhaps together we can change his course to one of righteousness.
Allah has set us on this path of friendship and trust. Let our people grow and prosper together.
You line your army across my borders? Let us hope you are not foolish enough to cross the desert sands.
Do not be so quick to claim land that isn't yours.
I will not warn you again. My sofa are eager to defend their homeland!
Do not think I haven't noticed your recent expansion. I must warn against stepping beyond your bounds.
You have proven yourself a brother! You have my thanks.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
These lands are valuable caravan routes. I will not give them up so readily.
I'll let this transgression pass... for now.
My treasury is endless! I'm sure we will be able to make a deal.
Let us open the caravan routes and encourage trade and exchange between our peoples.
A man must trust the path set by Allah, and know that He will come to the aid of the righteous.
Your army shall be made into sumbas and fill the ranks of my jonow!
I look forward to seeing you beg Allah for mercy, as my sofa's poison leaves your army weak and defenseless.
A pity! I treated you as a brother and you repay my kindness with hate.
I see your trust wasn't worth much.
There is still a profit the be earned from your lands.
I have come to not expect much from you.
Praise Allah for your wise judgment in this matter.

Let us open the caravan routes and encourage trade and exchange between our peoples.
A man must trust the path set by Allah, and know that He will come to the aid of the righteous.
Your army shall be made into sumbas and fill the ranks of my jonow!
I look forward to seeing you beg Allah for mercy, as my sofa's poison leaves your army weak and defenseless.
A pity! I treated you as a brother and you repay my kindness with hate.
I see your trust wasn't worth much.
There is still a profit the be earned from your lands.
I have come to not expect much from you.
Praise Allah for your wise judgment in this matter.
